title: The Favorites - NBA Finals Betting Update
itunes:title: The Favorites - NBA Finals Betting Update
description:
The NBA Finals heads to a pivotal Game 3!

Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter welcome on colleague Matt Moore along with Jason Timpf, host of the Hoops Tonight podcast on The Volume podcast network, to update them on how the series has played out thus far. What should bettors be wary of heading into Game 3? Are there any numbers to grab now prior to Wednesday night? And who has become the best bet for Finals MVP after two games? #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
